implementation_output.changes_summary: Enhanced README.md with comprehensive documentation: (1) Installation section with Quick Install (setup.bat/setup.sh) and Manual Install paths, including prerequisites; (2) Usage section documenting all CLI command groups (setup wizard, quick-install, uninstall, config, daemon, bootstrap) with example invocations and flags; (3) Architecture section explaining two-layer design (Bootstrap Daemon + MCP Server), supporting subsystems, and key modules with text-based diagram. All referenced CLI commands, flags, file paths, and module names verified against source code.

results.details: Verified all daemon and bootstrap subcommands and flags in daemon_cmd.py and bootstrap_cmd.py
Verified all key module paths exist: daemon/bootstrap_daemon.py, daemon/installer.py, server.py, config.py, cli/
